rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel build.syslog, truncated user.name to avoid login error
only if $lo.uallow.syslog is null it will go to init.info
$lo.uallow.systlog is always inited, in set.info/set.login.globalvars $lo.uallow.syslog=nullsub(allow.syslog in $INFO.RECORD, true)
start.0 ->normal exit to init.info->select.company -> if not only one record, msg and exit, else set.syslog.flag->decide.syslog ->true, init.syslog,false exit.normal
changed: start.0->exit.normal to check.g.system.info -> null to init.info else set.syslog.flag
change $sa.info to $G.system.info except the cleanup ones
add statements to assign variable name to IP address and PID stored in $sa.syslog.

descript.descript: update panel build.syslog, truncated user.name to avoid login error
only if $lo.uallow.syslog is null it will go to init.info
$lo.uallow.systlog is always inited, in set.info/set.login.globalvars $lo.uallow.syslog=nullsub(allow.syslog in $INFO.RECORD, true)
start.0 ->normal exit to init.info->select.company -> if not only one record, msg and exit, else set.syslog.flag->decide.syslog ->true, init.syslog,false exit.normal
changed: start.0->exit.normal to check.g.system.info -> null to init.info else set.syslog.flag
change $sa.info to $G.system.info except the cleanup ones
add statements to assign variable name to IP address and PID stored in $sa.syslog.
